name: Silence Killing You
description:
How would you survive in the world, where silence is your greatest enemy?

Don't be scared and try our little experiment. 

There is a prize waiting for you.

The game was developed for the GDS Jam 2022 by the Tripodiki team (Michelle2, LucikS, PSonicJ).

Theme: "THE SKY IS THE LIMIT"

Controls:

  • Moving - WASD
  • Camera rotation - mouse
  • Action - left mouse button / SPACE
  • Menu - ESC
